@peeyoosh:  I wish (silly me) that 98% of the people go someplace else. I don't like encoding movies, especially requested ones, but those I don't like or must go to unimaginable lengths to obtain (most unappreciated thing - making and upping torrent is three seconds).

When I started, many years ago - three other guys and me were alone in encoding extra small sized stuff. I am only one that is still active today.
Then, others appeared. Better than me. And I wish all go there. 

Every now and then, but every few days, some new people came out of the woodwork, and have Columbus syndrome: America WAS discovered by Columbus - NOT CREATED. 

I do NOT encode from moment some moron pops-out and say "Let see what we have here".

AND - I do NOT comment work of other encoders. I deep  in my heart bear the thought that all do remarkable job.

PLEASE - do NOT post link to other encoders  "home" page - that is RUDE, called ADVERTISING on other people's threads, and very often people get banned for this.

P.S.: Forgive me that I have not made all letters big this time. I had a friend who was very sick, have troubles with reading tiny letters and I know how hard is for you too.
